verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, because that <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, she is <S%H7665>broken<s%> that was the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>: she is <S%H5437>turned<s%> unto <S%H4390>me<s%>: I shall be replenished, now she is laid <S%H2717>waste<s%>:

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H6865>Behold<s%>, I am against you, O Tyrus, and will cause <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3220>you<s%>, as the sea causes his <S%H1530>waves<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And they shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, and break <S%H2040>down<s%> her <S%H4026>towers<s%>: I will also <S%H5500>scrape<s%> her <S%H6083>dust<s%> from <S%H5414>her<s%>, and make her like the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock<s%>.

It shall be a place for the <S%H4894>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>: and it shall become a <S%H957>plunder<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
And her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> which are in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be <S%H2026>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring upon <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, a <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>, from the <S%H6828>north<s%>, with <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and with <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and with <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H6951>companies<s%>, and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

He shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and he shall <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%> against <S%H8210>you<s%>, and cast a <S%H5550>mountain<s%> against <S%H6965>you<s%>, and lift up the shield against <S%H6793>you<s%>.
And he shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H4239>engines<s%> of <S%H6904>war<s%> against your <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and with his <S%H2719>axes<s%> he shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> your <S%H4026>towers<s%>.

By reason of the <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> their <S%H80>dust<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H2346>you<s%>: your walls shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and of the <S%H1534>wheels<s%>, and of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, when he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, as men <S%H3996>enter<s%> into a <S%H5892>city<s%> where is made a <S%H1234>breach<s%>.

With the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> shall he tread <S%H7429>down<s%> all your <S%H2351>streets<s%>: he shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and your <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4676>garrisons<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And they shall make a <S%H7997>plunder<s%> of your <S%H2428>riches<s%>, and make a <S%H962>prey<s%> of your <S%H7404>merchandise<s%>: and they shall break <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and <S%H5422>destroy<s%> your <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>: and they shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H68>stones<s%> and your <S%H6086>timber<s%> and your <S%H6083>dust<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%>.
And I will cause the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of your <S%H7892>songs<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>; and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H3658>harps<s%> shall be no more <S%H8085>heard<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you like the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock<s%>: you shall be a place to <S%H4894>spread<s%> <S%H2764>nets<s%> <S%H4894>upon<s%>; you shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> no <S%H3068>more<s%>: for I the Lord have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> to <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>; Shall not the <S%H339>islands<s%> <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall<s%>, when the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H602>cry<s%>, when the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> is <S%H2026>made<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>you<s%>?

Then all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones<s%>, and lay <S%H5493>away<s%> their <S%H4598>robes<s%>, and put <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>: they shall <S%H3847>clothe<s%> themselves with <S%H2731>trembling<s%>; they shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> at every <S%H7281>moment<s%>, and be astonished at <S%H8074>you<s%>.

And they shall take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for <S%H559>you<s%>, and say to <S%H6>you<s%>, How are you destroyed, that were <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> of seafaring <S%H3220>men<s%>, the <S%H1984>renowned<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, which were <S%H2389>strong<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, she and her <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%>, which <S%H5414>cause<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> to be on all that haunt <S%H3427>it<s%>!

Now shall the <S%H339>islands<s%> <S%H2729>tremble<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall<s%>; <S%H339>Yes<s%>, the islands that are in the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled<s%> at your <S%H3318>departure<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2717>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, like the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are not <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>; when I shall bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> upon <S%H7227>you<s%>, and great <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall cover <S%H3680>you<s%>;

When I shall bring you <S%H3381>down<s%> with them that <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>, with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of old <S%H5769>time<s%>, and shall <S%H3427>set<s%> you in the low <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, in places <S%H2723>desolate<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>, that you be not <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>; and I shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6643>glory<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>;

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H1091>terror<s%>, and you shall be no <S%H1245>more<s%>: though you be sought for, yet shall you <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5002>again<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
